short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension provides lightweight New Tab for your browser with backgrounds from unsplash.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lightweight replacement for your New Tab. 
Refreshing your browser with new backgrounds from unsplash.com community for each new opened tab.
